title: Graphics Rendering Software Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. This role offers the opportunity to work on upcoming releases of Apple products in the Machine Learning and AI team.
description: The Algorithms organization in Apple’s Vision Products Group (VPG) is looking for a skilled Graphics Rendering Software Engineer to contribute to state-of-the-art real-time rendering techniques.
key_qualifications: Excellent coding skills in C/C++, extensive experience with graphics APIs, knowledge of Shader Languages, understanding of the graphics pipeline, experience with 3D math, software prototyping skills, basic 3D computer vision knowledge, and excellent communication & teamwork skills. Experience with AR/VR rendering technologies is a plus.
education_experience: BS, MS or PhD in computer vision, machine learning, computer science, computer engineering or 2+ years of relevant industry experience with successful projects.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200. Employees also have the opportunity to become Apple shareholders, receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, free services, reimbursement for educational expenses, and more. Bonuses, commission payments, and relocation may also be applicable.
